name: The Floor Is Still Really Cheap Lava
name_original: The Floor Is Still Really Cheap Lava
description: Avoid randomly placed cheap lava and collect various power-ups along the way to see how far you can get! New power-ups, game modes, and bosses are now featured, along with a special game mode, Jewel Heist, where you can compare times with people from around the world and try to steal $1 million dollars worth of jewels without getting caught by lasers in the shortest amount of time.
